sn52.5:1.2: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
sn52.5:1.3: “asekhenavuso anuruddha, bhikkhuna katame dhamma upasampajja vihatabba”ti?
sn52.5:1.4: “Asekhenavuso sariputta, bhikkhuna cattaro satipatthana upasampajja vihatabba.
sn52.5:1.6: Idhavuso, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn52.5:1.9: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam—
sn52.5:1.10: asekhenavuso sariputta, bhikkhuna ime cattaro satipatthana upasampajja vihatabba”ti.
